hiveArticle.title: Bitcoin, Blockchain & Ethereum Meetup in Bangalore, India
hiveArticle.body:
Unocoin, Indiaâ€™s leading Bitcoin & Blockchain company is back with â€œBitcoin, Blockchain & Ethereum Meetupâ€ on the disruption happening in the FinTech industry pioneered with Bitcoin (aka â€œThe Internet of Moneyâ€) trying to redefine the concept of â€˜Moneyâ€™.

This meetup is designed to address the growing interest in Blockchain (the underlying technology empowering Bitcoin) and the available open platforms to build upon Ethereum (aka â€œThe World Computerâ€) along with their implications on the business processes.

Unocoin has one mission - â€œBringing Bitcoin to Billionsâ€.

Agenda:

1. Introduction to Bitcoin & cryptocurrencies
2. Understanding Blockchain, the technology
3. Segregated Witness & Payment Channels

5. Token technology & ICOs (Initial Coin Offerings)

Registration Link : https://goo.gl/TvxVzz
